sentences.english: She wore a checked shirt tied in a knot above the navel.

sentences.english: So she might borrow a piece of clothing or jewelry from a friend or family member.

sentences.english: Suddenly he had an intense desire to see what was tied in his cloth.

sentences.english: Or a timid creatures clinging to my mother's skirt.

sentences.english: That ell as if first meets you, the clothes angular divergence scatters fragrance.
